import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from './service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html' }) export class AppComponent { title = 'app'; newdata: any; public customers: Customers[] = []; /* constructor(private _apiService: ApiService) { }*/ constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'customers').subscribe(result => { this.customers = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } //ngOnInit() { // this._apiService.getData().subscribe(res => { // this.newdata = res; // console.log(res); // }) //} } interface Customers { id: number, customerName: string, address: string, totalOrderedCost: number, ordersCount: number }
